testingRequirements: Tests must validate user-facing behavior, not implementation details
Focus on what users actually do - integration tests over unit tests
Don't mock excessively - test real behavior where possible
Coverage metrics are meaningless - user flow coverage is everything

userStories.title: Finalize and document luxury color palette
userStories.description: Create color palette with 6 colors. Define CSS variables in src/styles/colors.css. Test WCAG AA contrast ratios.

userStories.title: Select and implement premium fonts
userStories.description: Choose serif font for headlines (Playfair Display) and sans-serif for body (Inter). Load via Google Fonts. Define typography hierarchy.

userStories.title: Create CSS design tokens and variables
userStories.description: Create src/styles/tokens.css with spacing scale (8px base), shadows, border radius, and transitions.

userStories.title: Document design system guidelines
userStories.description: Create docs/DESIGN_SYSTEM.md documenting color palette, typography, spacing, and component usage.

verificationSteps: Run `pnpm type-check` - must pass with no errors
Run `pnpm lint` - must pass with no errors
Run `pnpm test` - all tests must pass

epicDescription: Establish the luxury design system including color palette, typography, spacing, and CSS variables
